<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Moment of Clarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=131) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 88 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You push back your rage for a moment in order to think clearly. Until the end of this turn, you can use actions with the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait even if those actions don’t have the [rage](/Traits.aspx?ID=135) trait.
name: Moment of Clarity
